content.question: Scholars interpret the small figures carved on the staff god from Rarotonga as

choices.label: female water deities celebrated in annual new year rituals
leaders of a new dynasty fostered by contact with nearby islanders
male and female figures representing ideas of regeneration and fertility
fallen warriors representing the concept of heroism and sacrifice

content.answer: male and female figures representing ideas of regeneration and fertility

topic.text: 9.3: Theories and Interpretations of Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
